price: Ku munsi w’imperuka (Farawo) azarangaza imbere abantu be aberekeze mu muriro, kandi aho bazaba berekejwe ni ho habi.
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
